headline: AIG Appoints Ray Hall as Head of Western World
summary: NEW YORK, April 21, 2025--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced the appointment of Ray Hall as Head of Western World, effective immediately. Mr. Hall will report directly to Lou Levinson, President and Chief Executive Officer, Lexington Insurance – an AIG company.

Mr. Hall will report directly to Lou Levinson, President and Chief Executive Officer, Lexington Insurance – an AIG company.
